meanings.definition: A journey for pleasure or education.
meanings.sent1: During the summer, my family went on exciting tours of historical sites.
meanings.sent2: Many people enjoy taking tours of museums to learn about art and history.
meanings.sent3: The tours of the zoo were so fun that even the animals wanted to join!
meanings.sent4: Her imagination took her on tours of distant lands while she read her favorite book.
meanings.sent5: The tours of the ancient ruins brought history to life before our eyes.

meanings.definition: A guided visit to a place of interest.
meanings.sent1: The school organized tours to the science museum for the students.
meanings.sent2: Visitors can take tours of the famous castle to explore its grand halls.
meanings.sent3: During the ghost tours of the old mansion, the guide pretended to be a spooky spirit.
meanings.sent4: The tours of the chocolate factory were like a sweet dream come true.
meanings.sent5: The guided tours of the botanical garden revealed the beauty of nature up close.

meanings.definition: To make a journey or trip.
meanings.sent1: Next summer, we plan to tours around Europe to see all the famous landmarks.
meanings.sent2: She often tours for work, visiting different cities to meet with clients.
meanings.sent3: The little toy car tours around the playroom, exploring every corner.
meanings.sent4: His mind tours through memories of childhood, bringing back moments of joy.
meanings.sent5: The music group tours across the country, sharing their songs with fans everywhere.
